like:
UpLead comes in at a tiny fraction of the cost of the "big" data providers out there. Our clients love our ability to deliver lists and contacts in minutes, at minimal cost.

Data quality is generally good. I'd say it's something like an 80% hit rate, though that takes into account an absolute TON of "accept all" email addresses. For better or worse, though, that's the way of the world.

The customer service team is great. An intern mistake cost us a TON of credits. They understood and reimbursed, no questions asked.
dislike:
A built-in company name -> URL converter would be extremely useful. We need to use third-party tools now, which adds effort and expense.

Industry search could be a bit more intuitive. If you have a SIC or NAICS code (or a knowledge of the technical industry title) it's great. If it's a prospect segment that goes across multiple parts of SIC segment, things get trickier. At that point, you're running some pretty draconian negatives.

Company revenue (as seems to be standard with these types of data systems) is often inflated quite a bit. That's to be expected, but it does take one potentially available filter out of the equation.
problems solved:
Our clients always need specialized lists. UpLead lets us provide them quickly and easily.

The ability to directly enrich or create records in Nimble is important. We use that CRM, as do several of our clients. Direct integration (without the need for a spreadsheet interstitial) is key. On the spreadsheet side, the completeness is excellent.

like: Really enjoy the layout of UpLead and I feel good about the larger companies that use it.

like:
Uplead makes it very easy to find industries and target companies by use of different technologies. Making a list of companies filtering for size, industry and location is a breeze with the layout. Once you've found your target companies, its very easy to find specific titles and add them to a customized list. Our company has a CRM integration with salesforce dot com so pushing your new leads over to work with them is incredibly seamless.

I really like the fact that once you try to unlock an email it is tested at time of unlock. If the email is found to be invalid you get your credit back. This is way better than the alternative of scraping the email, sending it off into cyberspace and then getting an Undeliverable or worse yet not receiving an mailer daemon & just wondering  where  your outreach sitting.
dislike: There are a few times  I've ran into some stale information and I don't mean by like a couple of years, I mean like a decade or more. It doesn't happen very often but, its like any other database of information - not necessarily a huge knock.

I find that my combining a targeted approach of choosing who I'm going after AND tailored message has worked best.

like: Uplead has several features to narrow or expand business lead searches by type of industry. Designations of leads provide intelligence into operating models of companies, and help channelize inquiries with good precision.  Options of company search and contact search offer convenience and speed.  Within industry, the sub-categories help scale and limit searches without overwhelming the database.  Contact searches are simplified and easy to navigate.
dislike: Searching by role is sometimes cumbersome. For example, when searching for leadership roles in Engineering (VP, Director, Manager), it is difficult to just search "Engineering" and expect those roles to show up. Some of the contacts are not downloadable, indicating that UpLead is not validating and purging them frequently. Sometimes no contacts for a company can be downloaded. Also, sometimes emails sent to the downloaded leads bounce back, indicating the person might no longer be with the company. Before downloading the lead, I often check their LinkedIn status to get confidence in the validity of the lead. Perhaps, UpLead could add the option for users to report invalid leads.
problems solved: The key challenge for me was to generate industry-wide leads to develop a comprehensive and large audience for advertising business services of my company. UpLead not only made it possible, but also easy and straight-forward.

like: The option to filter through leads is awesome.  I find the interface easy to use.
dislike: You have to choose which type of emails you will accept as not all emails are validated.
problems solved: Biz Dev.  Growing new client base.

like: Ease of use. Searching by industry or person is simple. I have a fairly high rate of success with capturing the right email for the person I am wanting to reach out to.
dislike: about 5% of the emails or contacts are not valid.
problems solved: I am generating leads in Uplead and then vetting names via linkedin to make sure I have the right person. I get better responses when I know I have the right person. This really is a great resource.

like: The team from Uplead is extremely helpful and supportive.
dislike: I struggled a bit with the search and filter possibilities.
problems solved: Getting verified email and phone numbers is a great help to get in touch with the right prospects.

like: Easy way to search for specific contacts in the industries I prospect into. The data is relevant, accurate, and the integrations to my CRM make it extremely easy to import the data I've pulled!
dislike: Wish there was more data from SMB / Mid Market sized customers.
problems solved: Finding direct contact to desision makers, it cuts prospecting time in half when you can go directly to the right contact.

like: Very comprehensive, found almost everyone I searched for
dislike: I couldn't find anything that I disliked at all
problems solved: I'm researching companies and locating the proper individuals to prospect

like: Easy to use interface, accurate data,  and great company insights.  Emails are verified and accurate. Customer service is very responsive and helpful if an issue arises.
dislike: Ability to integrate with the CRM I use.
problems solved: Lead generation, prospecting, lead info,save time in getting information. One platform for insights, email verification, and contact data. The ability to find data quickly and efficiently.

like: All the filters and segmentation options allow you to find what you're looking for quickly.
dislike: Uplead could have a click to call option.
problems solved: We are using uplead to put an ease on our lead gen efforts

like: I like the ability the quickly export into an excel file
dislike: I wish there were more verifiable email addresses.
problems solved: I can find the right point of contact.

like: The Uplead system is much more than attracting new customers with marketing, it allows it to broaden this objective and to bring traffic and sales, however it is a system that is coupled to automate sales that is what Uplead offers to me, it seems great because it offers great changes in the sales and presentation of the company a more complete support and in addition to allowing solutions to be provided to our clients in the sense of making such sales is detailed and complete.
dislike: It has definitely allowed us to achieve viable solutions in the sense of being able to expand our sales for this reason I do not have a negative point regarding the operation of Uplead I think it is great that this software can make an additional automation system to the sales system for me it has been very complete detailed and I like how it worked.
problems solved: The Uplead and marketing system is necessary in the company and the functionality to expand both the traffic and new customers but in turn manage the sales to automate in order to offer support, help, offers, promotions allowing to bring the customer and Specify, for me it is a reliable platform that ensures a massive sale allowing to achieve trust and automation objectives. I am very happy.

like: I like the detailed filters more than any of the other tools that I have used in the past. We work with a lot of wholesalers/distributors, and that filter did not exist on some of the other tools that I have used.
dislike: Everything works well. Some of the data is not completely accurate, but that is to understandable with these tools.
problems solved: I am finding companies and contact information that I did not already have.

like: I really liked how user friendly is it to use. I've used other services like zoominfo and seamless.ai. Uplead is the most cost effective and gives me correct information for me to pursue the companies I want to.
dislike: Nothing really other than maybe more contacts. I do like how they're able to fix broken email addresses and phone numbers.
problems solved: I'm able to reach out to decision makers without having to call and bounce around to different departments. It's beneficial to use for bigger companies. This changes my follow up from 8-15 touches to 5-10 as I have the right person to connect with each time.

like: They collect the information from many resources and bring it to one place with advanced search.
dislike:
They still need to add more functions like contact with the leads and integration with other platforms.
Also if they can offer some information about the leads' needs that will be great.
problems solved: Searching for qualified leads.

like: Uplead allows me to provide credits immediately to my team.  Or set a monthly amount that they receive without me going into the system.
dislike: The price.  It is spendy.  But i believe our ROI of needing only to land 5 accounts over $2k for the year is worth the investment.
problems solved: Finding new prospects in a territory that is brand new where we can no longer knock on doors due to Covid!

like: Data is super reliable.  If they do not have it, they tell you before spending any credits.  I have been reviewing tools like UpLead for a couple months now and have found that they have provided the most consistent approach to attaining their data and have had few, if any discrepancies.  Their pricing is fantastic for what you receive.
dislike: The only thing I dislike is the use of credits, however, I find that the credits we will sign up to use is more than enough for myself to use.  Since I have not supplied any data to a CRM tool yet, I cannot speak to the ease of this transfer.
problems solved: The problems I have been able to solve with Uplead is having the most up to date email addresses and phone numbers possible.  I had a tool that was not as up to date as I would have liked and found myself calling and emailing to prospective clients, only to find that the email addresses were bad or the people no longer worked there.  Uplead has been able to help me prospect with much more reliable information and get in front of more people, faster.

like: As a B2B Lead generation agency, we've used UpLead for both ourselves and our clients. It's a fantastic database of relevant contacts that helps you target your outreach more efficiently. The best thing about UpLead is its user-friendly interface, which is very helpful when clients access it as they often want a simple experience.
dislike: There's really nothing we dislike about UpLead. It's been a great tool.
problems solved: With UpLead, we're able to target our outreach better and ensure maximum ROI. It's also been a fantastic way for clients to gain a better understanding of how lead generation works, and what it entails. They can see where their leads are coming from, and this helps them adjust their marketing accordingly.

like: I can find contact info from the company name and see the list of employees and titles.   I like that emails and direct dials & sometimes cell numbers are available.
dislike: Contact information is not always accurate
problems solved: Getting additional contact info for remote workers.

like: It is a platform that provides data from companies and high-quality B2B contacts, you can also obtain with the tools that a verification of emails in real time, technology monitoring, marketing based on accounts, associated profile links among others. It has great integrations with SalesForce, Zapier, and more. This way you can create a filtered view of potential clients. In general it is very complete, it has a good interface that allows you to navigate without problems.
dislike: Our results obtained with Uplead are good, however it is not so intuitive when carrying out massive email campaigns, this does not mean that it is a bad platform, on the contrary our experience has been satisfactory.
problems solved: We use UpLead for lead generation, optimal marketing performance such as social media posts, email postings, and to retrieve company details and contact information such as phone number, email address, and name. We create massive email campaigns for greater customer acquisition, this has generated that our work team has a work flow and saves valuable time that we now channel in other areas. Our sales department allows us to target prospecting and business development projects. We are happy with the results and the productivity achieved, we increased our sales and we have higher income.

like: I like a reasonable cost to find new prospects with up to date information and direct email.
dislike: Some of the titles and spelling are incorrect, the monitoring and editing could use some improvement.
problems solved: I have more leads and prospects in my funnel without having to spend $8,000.00 per year that I will never use, and they are just as reliable as D&B!

like:
Uplead is easy to use and a well built tool. Finding leads in B2B space is a very difficult task. Before using Uplead, we had to manually search for leads. The process was very daunting and time-consuming. Uplead has made prospecting and lead generation very easy for us. Not only we can now connect with our potential clients, the tool has also helped us save hundred of hours in productivity value.
The contact information is accurate.
dislike: The one thing I dislike about Uplead is the credit costs. They are bit expensive as compared to their competitors. Being a small business, it is hard for us to spend thousands of dollars on marketing and this is they only issue I've had with Uplead.
problems solved: Finding the potential clients in a B2B centered business is always a difficult job. With very few people attached to this mode of business, we previously had to scrap the data by google searches. At the end of they day, we used to end up with 15-20 leads. With the power of Uplead, we have access to tens of thousands of leads without having to search them on Google. Have made our life easier.

like: Our team did the same exact search in UpLead and 4 of their competitors. Then we tried 3 more searches, just to be sure and every time UpLead returned the most companies, as well as, contacts with the data we were looking for. It was super easy to connect with the other sales tools we are using. The search functionality is intuitive and easy to use. Plus, their Support and responses have been outstanding.
dislike: There haven't been any dislikes yet, so far our experience has been really good and I would recommend trying them out.
problems solved: UpLead is solving our data issue because we are looking for more targeted prospects. The benefits are that it's fast and easy to find the data you are looking for.

like: The UI is cleaner and more intuitive. I like how the search functions and keywords are similar to Google Ads, which I'm already used to. I like how quickly I can find my target prospects compared to LI Sales Navigator.
dislike: I don't like the fact that you can't tell which emails are verified until you try to use a credit to reveal them. I wish you could display search results only by verified emails.
problems solved: The tool saves me time and adds speed to creating micro, high-targeted campaigns. And it does a lot things that you used to need multiple tools for all in one platform. I also like the month-to-month billing option because I'm a smaller sole proprietor business and I am sporadic with my use of this kind of tool.

like: helps with research, and makes easier to make new conatcts
dislike: I honestly can not find anything that i dislike about UpLead
problems solved: getting mobile numbers or new business numbers

like: Finding email addresses and building lists
dislike: not enough emails addresses and companies found in Canada
problems solved: Using Uplead to build a list of find an email saves me so much time and effort!

like: The user interface is clean and intuitive and I can locate specific, targeted contacts in seconds. It's incredibly effective and easy to use.
dislike: The only challenge is actually a positive attribute of the platform and its functionality: there are so many ways to filter that it can seem overwhelming and I'm rarely sure that I am using the optimal set of filters.
problems solved: Finding contact info for my very specific list of sales targets, either finding the emails associated with the names we've already found or finding roles/names/contact info within specific companies we want to target.

like: No commitment , data accuracy , great after sales support
dislike: maybe the portal interface and user experience
problems solved: we are getting good traction on sales
